name: medicareful
description: [Medicareful](http://medicareful.com) is a consumer facing property of [Ritter Insurance Marketing (RIM)](http://ritterim.com). The goal of the site is to help older Americans or their loved ones find the *"right"* type of plan for their needs. These plans include: **Original Medicare**, **Medicare Supplement**, or **Medicare Advantage**. The way we determine the best plan is through a survey of pointed questions.
author: Ritter Insurance Marketing
